taskName1: Puzzle out the word with the help of the key to the Numbers and Letters Cipher. Use the keyboard on your computer and don't forget to switch it into English.
taskName2: Puzzle out the word with the help of the key to the Emoji Cipher. Use the keyboard on your computer and don't forget to switch it into English.
taskName3: Puzzle out the word with the help of the key to the Think out of the Box Cipher. Use the keyboard on your computer and don't forget to switch it into English.
